Upon reaching 14th level, your appearance permanently gains an otherworldly aspect that makes you look more lovely and fierce.

In addition, as a bonus action, you can assume a magically majestic presence for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated. For the duration, whenever any creature tries to attack or target you with a spell or spell-like effect for the first time on a turn, the creature must make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, it cannot attack or target you you on this turn, and it must choose a new target for its attack or the attack is wasted. On a successful save, it can attack or target you you on this turn, but it has disadvantage on any saving throw it makes against your spells on your next turn.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
